issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Vectorization: IF Statements, Comparisons, and more do not handle NULLs correctly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Debugging scratch column reuse is particularly painful and slow, adding a config allows for this to be done without rebuilds.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Add a debug config option to disable scratch column reuse
